es.title: Generar Promedios
es.info: Estos promedios fueron generados con la suma de todas los notas divido la cantidad de tareas creadas, pero recuerda que la nota final la marcas tu

en.info: These averages were generated with the sum of all grades divided by the number of tasks created, but remember that the final grade is set by you.
en.title: Generate Averages
